item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 4th February
item.description:
Please could a tree inspector assess the trees, particularly the willow trees, along the A38 at The Leigh Layby to determine responsibility for their maintenance (Gloucestershire County Council or the customer, who is the adjacent landowner). Any necessary works could then be considered and carried out as appropriate.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parts of the road sign are missing and some are rotated, 3rd February
item.description:
Outside about 142 Hales Road the sign showing roundabout exits is damaged. Parts of it are missing and other parts are rotated on the post so that motorists can’t actually see it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 139, Hales Road, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign plate is missing (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Large pothole just after bridge., 3rd February
item.description:
This pothole is getting bigger and deeper. Please can you fix it quickly. To avoid it on my bike I have to put myself in a dangerous position on the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Keynsham Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep pothole; caused puncture to front passenger tyre and wheel damage, 3rd February
item.description:
Driving up Leckhampton hill towards Crickley Hill - c. 9.45pm Tuesday 3rd Feb. Heavy rain. Oncoming headlights dazzled so couldn’t avoid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several pot holes and it’s dangerous, 3rd February
item.description:
These are by no2. It’s dangerous as I ride my bike several times a day and find it hard to find a safe route when cars are on other side or over talking. It’s so dangerous and an accident Waiting to happen. Please do something if you can

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Mead Road, Naunton, Cheltenham

item.title: Huge potholes all along Warden Hall Road. Several have got worse in recent weeks - very dangerous now especially in the dark, 3rd February
item.description:
Very bad between the roundabout and Bournside school. There are also some after the school further along the road. The whole road needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Warden Hill Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
